snippet: One popular Advertising Week seminar was about getting the approval for campaigns that go beyond creative to just plain strange.
abstract: Advertising column notes Madison Avenue is sharing the spotlight with marketers and media executives during Advertising Week 2012 in New York; notes one popular seminar was about getting approval for campaigns that go beyond creative to just plain strange.

byline.original: By TANZINA VEGA and STUART ELLIOTT

lead_paragraph: One popular Advertising Week seminar was about getting the approval for campaigns that go beyond creative to just plain strange.

headline.seo: From Hamsters to Wizards, Weirdness That Succeeded
headline.main: From Hamsters to Wizards, Weirdness That Succeeded
headline.print_headline: From Hamsters to Wizards, Weirdness That Succeeded
